Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10000 to you. Considering the exceptional quality and unique benefits this product offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This represents a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make an informed decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
